meanings.definition: A univalent hydrocarbon radical, CH3, derived from methane.
meanings.sent1: The methyl group is a small part of a molecule.
meanings.sent2: She added a methyl group to the chemical formula.
meanings.sent3: The methyl group decided to throw a party in the molecule.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, the methyl group was the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: Picture the methyl group as a tiny but essential building block in a molecule.

meanings.definition: A compound containing a methyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the methyl compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: This medicine contains a powerful methyl group.
meanings.sent3: The methyl compound always made the other compounds jealous.
meanings.sent4: The methyl compound was like a secret ingredient that made everything work perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the methyl compound as a superhero in the world of chemistry.
